venue.address_1: Boston Common (next to Park St. MBTA)
venue.name: Freedom Trail

item.description:
We already know that you love Ron Paul. Do you like to run also?

Don your extra Ron Paul t-shirt and join us for a great way to get the word out about Ron Paul and get some exercise as well.

For those not runners, the Boston Commons is still a great place to sign wave, walk and hand out literature, and talk to a wide range of individuals.

Ron Paul advocates personal responsibility - maybe it's time for you to be more responsible about your health!

Mileage: 4 - 5 miles (though feel free to run .25 or 10 miles).
item.name: Runners (and Walkers) for Ron Paul
